contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Qatar Foundation and International Schools Services Partner To Provide Professional Opportunities for International Educators in the Middle East

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Qatar Foundation and International Schools Services have partnered to provide professional opportunities in the Middle East for international educators.

11-13 December 2014 - Education City, Doha

Join us in Education City Doha, as outstanding international schools seek to fill positions for the 2015/ 16 school year.

Job Seekers: edustaffing@iss.edu
Schools: dirofedstaffing@iss.edu
